Row

Provide access to a single row in a result set.

Summary
Row
Provide access to a single row in a result set.
Functions
opIndex
Get a fields contents by index
opIndex
Get a fields contents by field name.
get
Get a fields contents by index
get
Get a fields contents by field name
getFieldIndex
Get the field index by field name
getFieldType
Get the field type
getFieldDecl
Get a field’s SQL declaration
addField
Add a new field to this row

Functions

opIndex

Get a fields contents by index

Parameters

intfield index

Example

Row row = res.fetchRow();
printf("first=%.*s, last=%.*s\n", row[0], row[1]);

opIndex

Get a fields contents by field name.

Parameters

char[]field name

Example

Row row = res.fetchRow();
printf("first=%.*s, last=%.*s\n", row["first"], row["last"]);

get

Get a fields contents by index

Parameters

intfield index

get

Get a fields contents by field name

Parameters

char[]field name

getFieldIndex

Get the field index by field name

getFieldType

Get the field type

Parameters

intfield index

getFieldDecl

Get a field’s SQL declaration

Parameters

intfield index

addField

Add a new field to this row

Parameters

char[]name
char[]value
char[]SQL declaration, i.e. varchar(20), decimal(12,2), etc...
intSQL type

Todo

SQL type should be defined by the D DBI DBD interface spec, therefore each DBD module will act exactly alike.
